body_html: Implementing torch.zeros for sparse matrices isn't very difficult, but we'll probably have to implement a few other functions (like narrow, I think) for DataParallel to support sparse matrices.
body_text: Implementing torch.zeros for sparse matrices isn't very difficult, but we'll probably have to implement a few other functions (like narrow, I think) for DataParallel to support sparse matrices.
body: Implementing `torch.zeros` for sparse matrices isn't very difficult, but we'll probably have to implement a few other functions (like `narrow`, I think) for DataParallel to support sparse matrices.
